issues.title: Hardcoded message type check
issues.description: The code directly checks `message.message.type` for message type.  This is inflexible and will break if the message structure changes.  A more robust solution would involve a configurable mapping or a more descriptive type system.

issues.title: Missing error handling
issues.description: The code lacks error handling.  If `message` or `message.message` is unexpectedly null or undefined, it could cause runtime errors.  Adding checks and fallback mechanisms would improve robustness.

issues.title: Potential performance issue with animation
issues.description: The animation duration scales linearly with the message index (`index * 0.05 + 0.2`). For a large number of messages, this could lead to noticeably long animation times.  Consider capping the duration or using a more sophisticated animation strategy.

issues.title: Unclear `cn` function usage
issues.description: The `cn` function from `@/app/lib/utils` is imported but not used.  This suggests potential dead code or an incomplete implementation.

feedback: The code is generally well-structured and readable.  However, improvements in error handling, message type handling, and animation performance would enhance its robustness and maintainability.
